text: A good cover letter can make you stand out from the crowd
and help you get that all important interview

Here are six top tips for tailoring a
tantalising cover letter

Edit your cover letter for each
application

every job requires different skills and
there's no such thing
as a standard cover letter

Use key words and phrases from the
job advertisement

and research some industry jargon. It
shows your interested in the field
Do you know about the company?
Demonstrate that you've researched them. Employers love enthusiastic employees

Show what you can do for the
company. Your CV is all facts and figures

but your cover letter outlines why you
are the right person for the job

this being said try not to be
intimidated by the job description

as most candidates won't fit all the
requirements
Emphasise what you do have to offer
and how keen you are on the company
Finally keep it short and sweet

You shouldn't ramble on for five
pages
You can also see our sample cover letter
to get you started right here
Happy job hunting
